item.title: 2020 in pictures
item.description: Highlight of experiences and discoveries made in 2020

item.title: Paper review: ARTful Indexing for Main-Memory Databases
item.description: ART is an space efficient Radix tree for efficient indexing in main memory.

item.title: SparkSQL RDF Benchmarking
item.description: Systematic comparison of RDF relational schemas using Apache Spark.

item.title: Paper review: HOT Radix Tree
item.description: HOT is a efficient radix tree that uses a general purpose index structure for main-memory database systems or string intensive applications.

item.title: MIT's 6.824 Distributed System Course
item.description: This course project implements the Raft Consensus algoritm, Map Reduce, and a Fault-tolerant key/value storage service.

item.title: Cellular Automata Fluid Simulation
item.description: Implementation of fluid/liquid dynamics using Cellular Automata in Rust with CPU/GPU benchmarking.

item.title: Heatmap Alert
item.description: A tool for automating the structure, documentation and tracking of a new software project.

item.title: Procedural Earthbending
item.description: A game that explores the mechanics of VR by implementing a clever algorithm for procedural earhbending.

item.title: CO2 Emission Simulator
item.description: Given a simulated vahicle traffic on different cities, this app allows you to visualize the levels of CO2 emmited.and configuration files.

item.title: OSBox
item.description: OSBox automatically synchronizes, manages dependencies and configuration files in any operating system.

item.title: WordPress Calypso
item.description: Contribution to the JavaScript and API powered WordPress.com

item.title: Genesis
item.description: A tool for automating the structure, documentation and tracking of a new software project.

item.title: Dotfiles
item.description: Actively maintained personal system configurations and automation scripts.
